title: fo-10: E2E Test and Registration
description:
Create E2E test for FO-10 flow and register in navigation system.

`docs/projects/2026-02-09-fo-10/2026-02-09-fo-10-spec.md`

## Key Files
- `e2e/fo-10.test.ts` — E2E test verifying complete flow
- `nav.config.ts` — register FO-10

## Worker Notes

- No serialization needed (per e2e-config.md)
notes:
2026-02-09 10:34 - FO-10 info page successfully created following FO-09 info page pattern. Navigation registration complete with both Demo and Info routes. Overview page updated with version card and comparison table entry. All files compile successfully.
2026-02-09 10:41 - E2E test created successfully. Key learnings: (1) Step 4 uses 'Continue' button while steps 5-7 use 'Next' button, (2) Heart animations take ~3s to complete between discovery steps, (3) Fragment mode (step 5) appends text with '...' removal, sentence mode (steps 6-7) replaces text, (4) Chip counts verified: 8 initial + 15 expanded for AI-generated steps, (5) Test structure follows FO-09 pattern with adjustments for fixed 4-question flow and predefined topic chips.
closed_reason: E2E test and registration complete: Created comprehensive e2e/fo-10.test.ts verifying all 15 steps. Registered FO-10 in nav.config.ts, created info page, updated overview page. E2E test passes, navigation works, TypeScript compiles successfully.
